OtherSecuritiesGrp.Desc: ARENA SHORT DURATION HIGH YIELD FUN

SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: ACCOUNTING PRINCIPLES GENERALLY ACCEPTED IN THE UNITED STATES OF AMERICA REQUIRE PLAN MANAGEMENT TO EVALUATE TAX POSITIONS TAKEN BY THE PLAN AND RECOGNIZE A TAX LIABILITY (OR ASSET) IF THE PLAN HAS TAKEN AN UNCERTAIN POSITION THAT MORE LIKELY THAN NOT WOULD NOT BE SUSTAINED UPON EXAMINATION BY THE DEPARTMENT OF LABOR AND INTERNAL REVENUE SERVICE. THE PLAN ADMINISTRATOR HAS ANALYZED THE TAX POSITIONS TAKEN BY THE PLAN, AND HAS CONCLUDED THAT AS OF FEBRUARY 28, 2023, THERE ARE NO UNCERTAIN POSITIONS TAKEN OR EXPECTED TO BE TAKEN THAT WOULD REQUIRE RECOGNITION OF A LIABILITY (OR ASSET) OR DISCLOSURE IN THE FINANCIAL STATEMENTS.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: FORM 990, PART VI, SECTION A, LINE 6
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: MEMBERS ARE COLLECTIVELY BARGAINED PIPEFITTERS UNION LOCAL 537.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: FORM 990, PART VI, SECTION B, LINE 11B
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: THE BOARD OF TRUSTEES HAS GRANTED THE FUND ADMINSTRATOR AUTHORITY TO REVIEW AND FILE ALL TAX DOCUMENTS.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: FORM 990, PART VI, SECTION B, LINE 12
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: AS AN EMPLOYEE BENEFIT PLAN, THE PLAN IS SUBJECT TO THE CONFLICTS OF INTEREST POLICIES OF ERISA

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: FORM 990, PART VI, SECTION B, LINE 15
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: TRUSTEES RECEIVE NO COMPENSATION. THE BENEFIT FUND STAFF IS REVIEWED ANNUALLY AND COMPENSATION DATA IS REVIEWED BY BOTH THE BOARD OF TRUSTEES AND AN OUTSIDE CONSULTANT.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: FORM 990, PART VI, SECTION C, LINE 19
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: GOVERNING DOCUMENTS AND AUDITED FINANCIAL STATEMENTS ARE AVAILABLE UPON REQUEST.
THIS PROCESS DID NOT CHANGE FROM THE PRIOR YEAR
